title: Three people in a life-threatening condition after 'arson attack' at restaurant
description: Three people are in a life-threatening condition after a suspected arson attack at a restaurant in Ilford, say police.
content:
Three people are in a life-threatening condition after a suspected arson attack at a restaurant in Ilford, say police.

title: Human remains found in Lancashire may belong to children, say police
description: The bones were found by builders working on renovations for a property in the town of Lytham.
content:
Human remains found by builders in Lancashire may belong to children, according to police.
Fylde police officers were contacted at 12.37pm on 15 August after builders working on a house in Cleveland Road in Lytham found what they believed to be bones... [1340 chars]

title: Five people rushed to hospital after 'serious' fire at east London restaurant
description: Five people have been rescued and taken to hospital after a fire at a restaurant in London's Ilford. Police have launched an investigation.
content:
Five people were trapped inside the restaurant (Picture: UKNIP)
Five people have been rescued and taken to hospital after a fire at a restaurant in Ilford, east London.

title: West Ham 1-5 Chelsea Stats: Five-Star Chelsea Thrash Hammers with Ruthless Performance
description: Chelsea cruised to a 5-1 victory at London Stadium versus West Ham United as the Club World Cup champions showed their class.
content:
